column1: Little Goat Diner////My parathas burrito was tasty and inventive
column2: and I enjoyed it quite much: Indian flatbread
column4: an avocado and bean salad smothered in chili pepper sauce. At $12
column5: it's on the expensive side of things but not overtly so. But my friend and I decided to split a plate of hashbrowns sprinkled with goat cheese as our indulgence of the day
column6: and for $5 we received a serving so small that it wouldn't have been enough to feed a child. $5 for what was amounting to 3/4 of a a potato with 1/4 ounce of cheese (at most) is outrageous in my book.
